QuestData.Title: Liadrin's Command
QuestData.Description: Shal'Aran is bursting at the seams with refugees and rebels. We practically have an army now but not enough weapons or mana to keep everyone armed and un-withered.$b$bAnd in all of this, Lady Liadrin has a battery of requests I simply do not have the time to deal with.$b$bWill you go to her? Her growing army is hard to miss in Meredil.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lady Liadrin in Meredil.
